title: How Mars' ancient lakes grew shields of ice to stay warm as the Red Planet froze
description: The findings potentially solve the paradox of how liquid water seems to have persisted on Mars even when the climate grew too cold.
content: The findings potentially solve the paradox of how liquid water seems to have persisted on Mars even when the climate grew too cold.
